VehicleRoutingProblems.heuristic_single_min — Method

try to rearrenge sch by processing time. input:: if all_jobs is [] means condidates are 1, 2, ..., n Returns: array – sch that can not be processed in time.

source
VehicleRoutingProblems.point_distance — Method
point_distance(p1, p2)
  • p1: coordiante point in the form of [x1, y1]
  • p2: coordiante point in the form of [x2, y2]

return eucledian distance from (x1, y1) -> (x2, y2)
